content.1: Night, empty streets, ringing silence and your car.
content.2: What will you choose — loud high-quality sound or silent driving?
content.3: With DGT exhaust systems, you will feel like the king of the road. You create the sound of your mood yourself.

content2.1: The Slovenian DGT brand is an ideal replacement for the standard exhaust system.
content2.2: The products are manufactured in Taiwan. The standard system is scanned at the manufacturer's factory. This creates a 3D model that accurately reproduces the original. According to the resulting layout, a new exhaust system is being designed, ideally replacing the standard one.

how_to_control.title: How to control?
how_to_control.content: You can control the DGT exhaust system from a mobile application and from a remote control. There are three modes available, one of which opens the flap at an angle of 35 degrees. The function of manual adjustment of engine speed is working.

how_to_order.title: How to order?
how_to_order.content: Smart, eco-friendly, reliable DGT exhaust systems can be ordered on the official website, by phone or at the sales office. The order is made in advance: 50% of the cost. Delivery is up to two weeks.

content.1: We will install it on the day of receipt of the order.
content.2: Installation is carried out in regular places. This means that the previous design, if desired, can be returned back, without harm to the car.

content.1: The warranty on the exhaust system is 2 years
content.2: The products comply with Russian and European environmental standards and quality standards.
